task.summary: Add HttpRequest and add Internet permission for the application.
Now it can download a file without any problem.
Convert the data classes to Java instead of Kotlin.
Basic parsing of opml is actually working now. Bugger, it takes so much time to get it right.
Now the simple listing shows text name when responded.
